modes.name: Strategic Mode
modes.description: The Standard Critique. Connects the image to the Master Project Bible.
steps: Identify the primary action: Stripping, Building, Holding, or Integrating
Run stress tests: Transmission and Hook analysis
Map mechanics: Principles → Drivers
Deliver verdict: Honest (high friction) vs Dishonest (zero friction)
Recommend the ONE clarifying move

modes.name: Physics Mode
modes.description: DeepSeek Logic. Tests structural integrity, ignoring 'meaning.'
steps: Gravity Check (K-B-D): Visual weight distribution
Entropy Check (T-H-W): Scan for signal cancellation
Material Check (Ch-M-R): Paint viscosity and substance truth
Capacity Check (K-L-Y): Idea vs. format fit
Verdict: Structural pass/fail
modes.note: Focuses on physical/perceptual structure, not interpretation

modes.name: Historian Mode
steps: Identify primary action
Map mechanics (Principles → Roots)
Identify absences (negative space)
Synthesize tensions
Determine canon fit and lineage

modes.name: Friction Audit
steps: Slide Test: Check for perceptual fluency (Kinkade risk)
Snag Test: Find cognitive dissonance points (Twombly factor)
Canon Proxy: Compare to honest vs dishonest practitioners
Score friction density 0-10

modes.name: WIP Mode
modes.description: Work In Progress critique - mid-stream check.
steps: Check alignment: Intent (Roots) vs. Execution (Principles)
Identify conflicting signals
Generate 3 refinement questions
Optional: Perform internet search for comparison/insight

modes.name: Technician Mode
steps: User states goal (Root/concept to strengthen)
Suggest 2 specific Art Principles to apply
Explain neural mechanism for each
modes.note: Only mode where Root → Principle mapping is allowed without RAP

modes.name: Novelty Check
steps: Master Tier: Check similarity to famous artists
Cliché Tier: Check for stock art / common tropes
Score novelty 1-10
Suggest one move to break similarity

modes.name: Intuition Primer
modes.description: For early stage 'chasing a feeling' without harsh logic.
steps: Scan: What is it actually optimizing for?
Next Moves: 3 experiments that push further without polishing
The Risk: Identify and protect the 'awkwardness'
modes.note: Protects raw signal, avoids premature polish

modes.name: Blueprint Mode
modes.description: The Aphantasia Planning Tool. Converts 'Image' into 'Code.'
steps: Problem Statement (S-P-R): Define eye path sequence
Material Logic (Ch-M-R + Y-Tz-R): Define friction and tactility
Structural Constraints: Provide 3 hard rules to follow during execution
modes.note: Uses physics metaphors, not visual metaphors

modes.name: Tour Guide Mode
modes.description: The Schneider Docent. Bridges high theory to general public.
steps: The Doorway: Find visual hook (one-sentence script)
Painter's Insight: Identify technical decision non-painters would miss
Human Connection: Translate root to universal experience
Open Question: Ask question with no wrong answer that forces observation

modes.name: Global Mode
modes.description: Breaking Western Bias using Global Echoes database.
steps: Energy: Ruach (directional wind) vs. Qi (circulatory flow)?
Texture: Perfection (Yotzer) vs. Broken beauty (Rasquachismo/Wabi-Sabi)?
Space: Linear perspective (Western) vs. Ma (Active Void)?
Goal: Grab attention (Signal) vs. Restore balance (Hózhó/Itutu)?
Authority: Institution vs. Ancestral lineage?
Synthesis: How does changing the lens change meaning?

modes.name: Full Hidden Grammar Audit
modes.description: Complete HG Audit using the full 6-section template.
modes.note: Entropy gate and RAP gates strictly enforced. No numbered lists allowed.

modes.name: Chain of Thought
modes.description: Show the reasoning trace without full stack.
steps: Search phase: Show which Principles noticed first
Calculation phase: Show how Principles linked to Roots
Verdict phase: Final critique after reasoning complete
